title: API Reference
description: REST API documentation for Next PPDB.
content:
API Reference

Next PPDB provides a RESTful API for programmatic access to all data. Interactive documentation is available via Swagger UI.

Interactive Documentation

Swagger UI: http://localhost:3000/api/docs

OpenAPI JSON: http://localhost:3000/api/docs/openapi.json

API Endpoints

Animals

| Method | Endpoint | Description |
|--------|----------|-------------|
| GET | /api/animals | List/search animals |
| POST | /api/animals | Create new animal |
| GET | /api/animals/\[id] | Get animal by ID |
| PUT | /api/animals/\[id] | Update animal |
| DELETE | /api/animals/\[id] | Delete animal |
| GET | /api/animals/\[id]/notes | List animal's notes |
| POST | /api/animals/\[id]/notes | Create note for animal |

Customers

| Method | Endpoint | Description |
|--------|----------|-------------|
| GET | /api/customers | List/search customers |
| POST | /api/customers | Create new customer |
| GET | /api/customers/\[id] | Get customer by ID |
| PUT | /api/customers/\[id] | Update customer |

title: Administration
description: Learn about administrative features in Next PPDB.
content:
Administration

Next PPDB includes administrative tools for database management and system maintenance.

Database Backup

The backup feature creates complete copies of your database.

Navigate to Database Backup from the sidebar.

Create New Backup

Click the button to create an instant backup:

Create Backup

Each backup contains:

Complete SQL dump of all tables

Table structure definitions

All data records

Compressed as a ZIP file

Available Backups

The system stores up to 5 recent backups:

Available Backups

| Column | Description |
|--------|-------------|
| Filename | Timestamped filename (e.g., 20251202-000317-backup.zip) |
| Date/Time | When the backup was created |
| Size | File size in KB |
| Download | Link to download the backup |

Downloading Backups

Click Download to save a backup. Store backups:

On external drives

In cloud storage

Off-site for disaster recovery

description: Learn how to manage the breed database in Next PPDB.
content:
Breeds Management

The breed database stores all available breeds with their associated grooming times and pricing.

Page Header

Breeds Header

Navigate to Manage Breeds from the sidebar to access this page.

Adding a New Breed

Use the "Add New Breed" form at the top of the page:

Add New Breed Form

| Field | Description |
|-------|-------------|
| Breed Name | Required - Enter the breed name (e.g., "Golden Retriever") |
| Average Time | Grooming duration in HH:MM:SS format (default: 01:00:00) |
| Average Cost | Base price in dollars (default: lowest existing breed cost) |

Time Format Examples

01:00:00 = 1 hour

01:30:00 = 1 hour 30 minutes

00:45:00 = 45 minutes

title: Customer Management
description: Learn how to manage customer records in Next PPDB.
content:
Customer Management

Customer management allows you to create, view, and update customer records. Each customer can have multiple animals associated with their account.

Adding a New Customer

Navigate to Add Customer from the sidebar or dashboard.

Customer Information Form

Customer Form

| Field | Description | Required |
|-------|-------------|----------|
| First Name | Customer's first name | No |
| Surname | Customer's last name | Yes |
| Address | Street address | No |
| Suburb | City/suburb name | No |
| Postcode | 4-digit postal code | No |
| Phone 1 | Primary phone number | No |
| Phone 2 | Secondary phone number | No |
| Phone 3 | Tertiary phone number | No |
| Email | Email address | No |

Form Actions

Insert Record - Save the new customer

Clear Form - Reset all fields

Cancel - Return without saving

Tips

Customer Tips

Surname is the only required field

Phone numbers are automatically normalized (digits only, max 11)

Postcode should be a 4-digit Australian postcode

title: Documentation
description: Welcome to the Next PPDB documentation - your guide to the Pampered Pooch Database.
content:
Next PPDB Documentation

Welcome to the Pampered Pooch Database (Next PPDB) documentation. This modern pet grooming management system helps you track customers, animals, breeds, and grooming services.

Home Search Screen

What is Next PPDB?

Next PPDB is a comprehensive pet grooming database application built with Next.js 15. It features:

Smart Search - Find animals by name, breed, owner, phone number, or email with relevance-based ranking

Customer Management - Track customer information, contact details, and associated pets

Animal Records - Maintain detailed grooming history and service notes for each animal

Breed Database - Manage breeds with customizable pricing and time estimates

Reports - Generate daily totals and track customer activity

Database Backup - Create and download database backups
